description:
Enable launcher on all displays by default
Updated tests to work on both environment. I did this so that
we can just flip the flag when we need to turn this off.

BUG=166119
TEST=some tests were updated to work under this environment.

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=177529

messages.text:
LGTM but please consider changing the command line string.

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/ash/ash_switches.cc
File ash/ash_switches.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/ash/ash_switches.cc#newcode80
ash/ash_switches.cc:80: const char kAshDisableLauncherPerDisplay[] = "ash-launcher-per-display";
Do you want to rename the flag to --ash-disable-launcher-per-display?

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd
File chrome/app/generated_resources.grd (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode6960
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:6960: +          Disable a launcher on secondary display.
Perhaps "Disable showing the launcher on the second display." ?

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/ash/ash_switches.cc
File ash/ash_switches.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/ash/ash_switches.cc#newcode80
ash/ash_switches.cc:80: const char kAshDisableLauncherPerDisplay[] = "ash-launcher-per-display";
On 2013/01/17 19:53:01, James Cook (Chromium) wrote:
> Do you want to rename the flag to --ash-disable-launcher-per-display?
yep. done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd
File chrome/app/generated_resources.grd (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/11975019/diff/10009/chrome/app/generated_resources.grd#newcode6960
chrome/app/generated_resources.grd:6960: +          Disable a launcher on secondary display.
On 2013/01/17 19:53:01, James Cook (Chromium) wrote:
> Perhaps "Disable showing the launcher on the second display." ?

Done.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/oshima@chromium.org/11975019/18001

subject: Enable launcher on all displays by default
